content: try this simple boxy-fit crochet tee that s worked in a mesh stitch double_crochet and chains for a casual summertime vibe featured in cool and comfy patons linen the armbands and neckband are worked in single_crochet back loop to create ribbed edgings practice chain single_crochet double_crochet and learn simple neck and armhole shaping you ll love the beautiful stitch definition on this project that comes to life in any color you love materials patons® linen™ 3 5 oz /100 g 275 yds /251 m sizes xs/s m l xl 2/3xl 4/5xl sweet potato 14011 3 3 4 4 5 6 balls finished chest xs/s 41 104 cm m 46 117 cm l 48 122 cm xl 53 134 5 cm 2/3xl 58 147 5 cm 4/5xl 65 165 cm
